description.ruby-sapphire:
Gains power if the user’s HP
is lower than the foe’s HP.
description.emerald:
Gains power if the user’s HP
is lower than the foe’s HP.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Gains power the
fewer HP the user
has compared with
the foe.
description.diamond-pearl:
An attack move that
cuts down the foe’s
HP to equal the
user’s HP.
description.platinum:
An attack move that
cuts down the foe’s
HP to equal the
user’s HP.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
An attack move that
cuts down the foe’s
HP to equal the
user’s HP.
description.black-white:
An attack move that cuts down the
target’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

An attack move that cuts down the

An attack move that cuts down the
target’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

An attack move that cuts down the
target’s HP to equal the user’s HP.
description.sun-moon:
This attack move cuts down the target’s HP to equal
the user’s HP.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:

the user’s HP.

effect.full: Inflicts exactly enough damage to lower the target's HP to equal the user's.  If the target's HP is not higher than the user's, this move has no effect.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.  This effect counts as damage for moves that respond to damage.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.
